column5: Feb 17-20. Including Family Day on Monday I'm looking forward to it.
Which one is it?  This one: https://springfishingandboatshow.com/
Wasnt very good last year, think I was in and out in about an hour. Doesnt really compare to the sportsman show in March.

Oh great, another place to spend money on stuff I don't need. I can't wait! I haven't been in a few years but always enjoyed it. Far better then the Sportsman Show. See you there, wear your OFC I.D. lanyard tag. Actually that's not a bad idea, where can I get one?  Funny I posted this while TJames posted his. The complete opposite revue of the shows. I don't luxury camp or want to build a new McMansion, that's what I saw at the Sportsman Show the last time I went, a long time ago I admit.

Oh great, another place to spend money on stuff I don't need. I can't wait! I haven't been in a few years but always enjoyed it. Far better then the Sportsman Show. See you there, wear your OFC I.D. lanyard tag. Actually that's not a bad idea, where can I get one?  Funny I posted this while TJames posted his. The complete opposite revue of the shows. I don't luxury camp or want to build a new McMansion, that's what I saw at the Sportsman Show the last time I went, a long time ago I admit. Even though they are both in the same building, the Sportsman Show occupies several times as much floor space.  There is way more to see at the Sportsman Show.  Even if they have some non-fishing exhibits at the show, they still have plenty of room left over to have more fishing related exhibits than the Spring Fishing Show.  A lot of people used to mention the difficulty of getting downtown and parking as a reason to attend the Spring Fishing Show instead of the Sportsman Show.  Now that the Sportsman Show is in the same location and also has free parking, there are fewer reasons to attend the Spring Fishing Show.
I'll be there, now I know the sportsman show is in the same venue I'll go to that too. Anyone have a link to admission coupons?  Is BPS tax free during these events?
I wish they offered more deals at these events.
You have to go to the tackle swaps to get any deals these days.  The shows are just retail price under one roof, with the odd exception.
Will be there Friday ... they have not posted times or dates on speakers as of yet  ????? would like to know who I am going to listen too ??
The schedule was posted last weekend.
Lots of great seminar speakers with a Musky and Bass day see you there: Fishing & Boat Show coupon:   http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/
I'll be there Saturday sunday and maybe Monday.  Hope to see some familiar faces
